attributes.action: Change the immigration requirements for UK citizens with a non EU spouse
attributes.additional_details:
This law is causing huge distress, so many of us want to come home, and are stuck apart, including children from their parents & adults from their elderly parents. Supposedly it is to stop a burden on the public purse, but you are not allowed to claim benefits anyway.
https://www.theguardian.com/uk-news/2016/feb/21/families-challenge-minimum-income-visa-rules-supreme-court-non-eu-partner
http://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/2016/07/19/please-theresa-may-relax-the-rules-for-spouse-visas--and-stop-te/
attributes.background: Currently the UK's immigration laws state that to bring a non-EU spouse to the UK you must have a minimum income of £18,600 or savings of £62,000. This is well above the average income. This has led to a huge rise in "Skype families", miserable and living apart due to the draconian laws.
